predict_diagnosis:
1. Spinal Muscular Atrophy (SMA)
2. Friedreich Ataxia (FA)
3. Charcot-Marie-Tooth Disease (CMT)
4. Hereditary Spastic Paraplegia (HSP)
5. Metabolic Myopathies
6. Mitochondrial Myopathies
7. Myotonic Dystrophy
8. Spinocerebellar Ataxias (SCA)
9. Neuromuscular Disorders (e.g., Becker Muscular Dystrophy)
10. rare neurogenetic disorders (e.g., POLG-related myopathies, myositis, or other inherited neuropathies)
